examples: his failure to pass the test

definitions.text: an event that does not accomplish its intended purpose
examples: the surprise party was a complete failure
he felt that his entire life had been a failure
that year there was a crop failure

definitions.text: a person with a record of failing; someone who loses consistently

examples: he resented my failure to return his call
the mechanic's failure to check the brakes

definitions.text: inability to discharge all your debts as they come due
examples: the company had to declare bankruptcy
fraudulent loans led to the failure of many banks

definitions.text: loss of ability to function normally
